title: Bloomberg Markets: NYU's Vasant on Automation in Finance

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Vasant Dhar\u0010Professor of Information Systems\u0010New York University Stern School of Business\u0010Discussing automation in finance and how robotics will change the nature of work.
